author: jcompagner
msg: 1> class loading problem, in web app you can't use system classloader
2> redirect problem applets can't handle client side redirects.

3> submit problems, document base was changed to the form submit/redirect listener, but you can't append the model url to the document base if it already has query params. So you have to strip that first.
4> the form of of sprockets shouldn't do the real submit anyway.. (at least i think that)

author: jcompagner
msg: must make private initalize components public final .. can't think another nicer way to hide it.
